Articles.Content: So my game randomly decided to squish inward, making planets look like eggs. It's very annoying. I hadn't made any significant changes to any mods to make it happen (changed a .cfg in ExotikWorlds a little but that didn't work. If anyone can help me get heightmaps to work, please do!). I re-downloaded the game from the store and nothing changed. PLEASE HELP!
What are your specks and can you give an error log?
